title: Cisco's Climate Change Commitments
itunes:title: Cisco's Climate Change Commitments
description:
Fran Katsoudas, Chief People, Policy, Purpose Officer at Cisco Systems, discusses the company's new commitment to achieve net-zero emissions by 2040.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
